attributes.action: Stop President Trump from making an official State Visit to the UK in 2019
attributes.additional_details:
The official United Nations website listing details of the Paris Agreement, including the 185 Parties, including the United States, that have ratified it: https://unfccc.int/process/the-paris-agreement/status-of-ratification
The official notice submitted by the United States to withdraw from the Paris Agreement: https://treaties.un.org/doc/Publication/CN/2017/CN.464.2017-Eng.pdf
The United States Fourth National Climate Assessment, which has been ignored by President Trump: https://www.globalchange.gov/nca4
attributes.background: President Donald Trump has initiated the withdrawal of the United States, the world's second largest emitter of greenhouse gases, from the Paris Agreement on climate change, putting lives and livelihoods in the UK and around the world at risk. He should not be honoured with an official State Visit.
